name: Emolga
flavorText:
The energy made in its cheeks’ electric
pouches is stored inside its membrane
and released while it is gliding.

previous.name: Sawsbuck
previous.flavorText:
They migrate according to the seasons.
People can tell the season by looking at
Sawsbuck’s horns.
previous.formDescription:
Forms only affect appearance.  Sawsbuck switches forms to match the season if it is in the party upon loading the game.

If the season has changed since the game was saved, and the game was saved indoors, the previous save's season will be displayed upon loading the game, and Sawsbuck will change according to that season.  Upon stepping outdoors, the change of season is displayed and Deerling will change again.

next.name: Karrablast
next.flavorText:
These mysterious Pokémon evolve when
they receive electrical stimulation while
they are in the same place as Shelmet.

pokemon.name: Emolga
pokemon.flavorText:
The energy made in its cheeks’ electric
pouches is stored inside its membrane
and released while it is gliding.
